supersloth.js

add an awesome sloth to your website.

supersloth me now!

Tweet
Share

Getting started

Download the library with bower, npm, git or als a zip file here:

Bower: bower install supersloth.js

NPM: npm install supersloth.js

Git: git clone https://github.com/kriskbx/supersloth.js.git

 

Integrate it

Copy and paste this code right before the body tag of your website, make sure to replace the url:

<script type="text/javascript" src="supersloth.js"></script>

Run this to get the slothy awesomeness: superslothjs.start();

Aaaaand, that's it.

handcrafted & drawn with by kris.
